Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Longport in 1970...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1982, hitting .422 with 8 HR, 24 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1983, hitting .542 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1983, hitting .443 with 5 HR, 21 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Lynchburg on 4/16/1984 to a 1-year deal worth $6,588,000 per year...
Hit for the cycle against Ashburn on 8/25/1984...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1984, hitting .381 with 6 HR, 16 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/17/1984, off Aaron Fresquez (CC)...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 10/1/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Coney Island on 2/5/1985 to a 2-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
